reviewText: My daughter loved this dvd,  she watch it over and over

My Grand- Daughter likes the movie very much. She watches it a lot. I would recommend this little movie for good entertainment for a young child.
My 5 year old loves Mona!! The 3 short shows are fun, yet exciting! The Mona the Vampire shows hold her interest! She loves the vampire heroine!
THIS WAS AN EXCELLENT PRICE FOR MONA THE VAMPIRE DIE HARD FANS.  MY GOD-DAUGHTES LUV THIS SHOW. GREAT GIFT.  LUV IT! =)

It is the on of the most cutest and intertaining cartoons that is new a fresh, as least for the United States.  My daughter saw this on Netflix, on the instance movies and loved it so much I had to get this for her for Christmas.  I think I will get all the ones that are available on Amazon.
